news1: ⭐ Ambuja Cement Q3 profit rises : In the December quarter, the cement manufacturer’s net profit rose 13% YoY to ₹488 crore. In the same period, the revenue also rose 4% to ₹8,036 crore. The management said that the cement sector witnessed higher production and capacity utilisation on account of the pickup in demand.
news2: ⭐ Hero Motocorp Q3 profit rises : The two-wheeler maker’s rose 3.6% YoY to ₹711 crore in Q3FY23. The revenue also grew 1.9% to ₹8,031 crore. The management expects the company to continue recovering market share, backed by launches over the next few quarters, especially in the premium segment.
news3: ⭐ CAMS Q3 profit falls : India’s largest registrar and transfer agent of mutual funds reported a net profit of ₹73 crore, down 4.6% YoY. In the same period, the revenue rose 2.5% YoY to ₹243 crore. Its asset under management (AUM) scaled to record high at ₹27.8 lakh crore on the back of growth in equity AUM.
